item.title: Student Pantry - Thanksgiving hours
item.description: Date: Friday, November 21, 2025 11:00 AM - The pantry will be open normal Tuesday (1-4pm) and Wednesday (9am - noon) hours during the break. It will be closed Friday November 28th.
item.author: Students

item.title: RPI Shuttle Service Announcement
item.description: Please be advised that there will be no RPI shuttle services from November 24, 2025 through November 29, 2025 in observance of the Thanksgiving break. Regular shuttle operations will resume on November 30, 2025.
item.author: Community

item.title: Waive The Fee on Select Visa and Mastercard $50 & $100 Gift Cards
item.description: Customers can purchase $50 and $100 Visa or Mastercard Blackhawk gift cards with no activation fee! Running from Monday, November 15th until Monday, December 1st. This deal is exclusive to in-store shoppers only. See store for additional details. rensselaerstore.com

item.title: RPI Holiday Concert and Victorian Stroll Kickoff | Dec. 6 (Registration Required)
item.description:
Date: Saturday, December 6, 2025 7:00 PM - 8:30 PM - Presented in partnership with the Rensselaer County Regional Chamber of Commerce, this free, family-friendly event invites you to celebrate the season with music, community, and festive refreshments.
